reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: Is the salary as per market standard?
Tell us about your last increment
How many hours you normally work in a day?
Does accenture have a flexible working hours policy?
How often do you have parties/offsites?

answersView.AnswerTextHi: प्रबंधन इस पर विश्वास नहीं करता है

reviewQuestionAnswesViews.QuestionText: How often do employees get promotions?
How many trainings do you attend every year?

answersView.AnswerText: More than 6 times in a year
answersView.AnswerTextHi: एक वर्ष में 6 बार से अधिक

detailedDescription.articleBody: Accenture plc is a multinational professional services company. A Fortune Global 500 company, it reported revenues of $43.2 billion in 2019 and had 492,000 employees, serving clients in more than 120 countries.
detailedDescription.articleBodyHi: एक्सेंचर पीएलसी एक बहुराष्ट्रीय पेशेवर सेवा कंपनी, ए फॉर्च्यून ग्लोबल 500 कंपनी है, इसने 2019 में $ 43,2 बिलियन का राजस्व दर्ज किया और इसमें 492,000 कर्मचारी थे, जो 120 से अधिक देशों में ग्राहकों की सेवा कर रहे थे।
